## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

```{r}
library(googlesheets4)

# Authenticate from service account (in GitHub Action it will be loaded from secret)
gs4_auth(path = ".github/spry-ivy-456913-t0-bab371265d6c.json")

df <- read_sheet(
  ss = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lIdlDMY30meMscm1Nn6uk9lzAYlPeI5AkqEnqzI7odk",
  sheet = "Sheet39")
```
